Welcome

You can use Bootstrap and your custom scss and js in this starting project.
Write your code in the files provided in the src folder and run 'npm run build' or 'npm run watch' to compile the dist folder.
Babel will automatically compile your JavaScript code and your SCSS code will automatically be transformed into CSS and loaded with JavaScript.
Your homepage will display the changes (PS: remember 'npm run build' or 'npm run watch' before). Have fun with code :)
